name: .GXT File Extension
summary: Learn about .GXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Grand Theft Auto (GTA), a game where players steal cars and complete missions; contains text that is displayed during gameplay; often included with GTA mods and may be translated into multiple languages.

content: GXT files are used in GTA 2 and later and there is one GXT file for each language. They are typically stored within the \â€‹text directory of a GTA installation.
You can modify GTA: San Andreas and GTA: 4 GXT files with the X GXT Editor and GTA: Vice City GXT files with the GTA: Vice City GXT Editor.
NOTE: The GXT format supports UTF-16 text encoding.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
